channel.title: Comments on: The Bull Pen Podcast #4: You Would Do What for a $20 BTC?

item.title: By: Stu G
item.dc:creator: Stu G
item.description: Funny episode, interesting to listen to someone so passionate about LTC - a lot of 'experts' keep saying that LTC is very undervalued at present. If Bitcoin Ben's version of the future of LTC is at all accurate you can certainly see why LTC would be regarded as very undervalued at present. Hodlit App sounds like an impressive step forward too - very interested to see that up and running.
item.content:encoded: Funny episode, interesting to listen to someone so passionate about LTC – a lot of ‘experts’ keep saying that LTC is very undervalued at present. If Bitcoin Ben’s version of the future of LTC is at all accurate you can certainly see why LTC would be regarded as very undervalued at present. Hodlit App sounds like an impressive step forward too – very interested to see that up and running.
